item.title: Quiet cul de sac . Constant inconsiderate parking., 16th January
item.description:
This cul de sac is close to a secondary school. At pick up and drop off times Moreton Close is blocked with parents parking. They park with no consideration to people who live there . Blocking Drives and access onto residents property. There is also a tight bend in to the road and there have been a number of very near misses with impatient drivers.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Moreton Close, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: NOT a pothole, a deep dip across the whole road, 16th January
item.description:
There is no category to report this and it’s causing severe reverberations to my house and the neighbouring houses. There is a FULL WIDTH divvit across the whole of Andover Road from lypiatt drive to hatherley street where a channel or something has been laid. Lorrie’s and other vehicles slam down on this dozens of times a day and it is hugely concerning. A visual inspection is completely insufficient to assess the extent of the impact, it must be understood in the context of larger vehicles driving over and the spread of the reverberations. It should be an easy fix so please do take seriously the size of this problem. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72, Andover Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
